name: Mudoba
description:
"Mudoba" is an atmospheric survival horror in a parallel dimension with one procedurally generated location.
You a research scientist who accidentally got into the "Theta" dimension.
You have the opportunity to learn about what exactly happened in this dimension, reveal its secrets and find a way out.
This dimension is very old and it is living its last days.



A gas mask, flashlight, medkits and map will help you in this:
  • A gas mask will help you survive in a toxic fog, look for filters for it.
  • The flashlight will allow you to see the darkest corners of the houses, but it needs batteries to work.
  • Medkits will help to heal your wounds quickly.
  • Fragments of the map will allow you to quickly navigate the area and find a way out.
  • Notes, pages of the book "Tachyonics" and secret protocols contain all the necessary information about this dimension.

Beware of water and what lives in it.
Find a way out of the marsh.

The game contains:
  • An adventure in the middle of a strange swamp
  • Nice graphics
  • Gloomy atmosphere
  • The plot is hidden in notes and secret protocols
  • English and Ukrainian localization
  • One procedurally generated location
